title: Deep Secret
description: Deep in a Derbyshire valley live two girls, twins, so alike they seem like one person, even their family canâ€™t tell them apart. But tragedy is waiting.When the valley is sold to be flooded for a huge dam, the villagers are forced to leave their homes. Deep secrets are uncovered. New characters enter their lives and desires. Love and grief come to the surface.
author: Berlie Doherty
